name: Katha Dalton
biography:
Sole proprietor designer/illustrator in the mid-1970s, when she designed the shopping bag in the Cooper-Hewitt collection. (Other Dalton bags in the "Bernie's series" include a bathing beauty and muscle boy against a faux Hokusai wave and a design of white snowflakes on black.)
Currrently Senior Designer and Design Project Manager, Hornall Anderson Design Works, largest design firm in the Pacific Northwest.

Source: Personal communication from Katha Dalto, October 5, 2001.
